text.textblock: Pursuant To The Government In the Sunshine Act

date.textblock: The following matters have been placed on the agenda for the open Parole Commission meeting:
1. Approval of minutes of previous Commission meeting.
2. Reports from the Chairman, Commissioners, Legal, Chief of Staff, Case Operations, and Administrative Sections.
4. Proposal for Professional Staff Training by the McGeorge School of Law, Institute for Administrative Justice.
5. Discussion on the Modification to Subchapter D, Sexual Offenses_232(a).
6. Proposal to Modify the Commission's present Position Requiring Examiners Participating in Single Examiner Hearings to Provide An Oral Recommendation at the Conclusion of the Hearing.
7. Proposal To Amend the Policy on Not Counting Prior Convictions in Determining the Salient Factor Score When the Court Records are Unavilable.
8. Proposal to Amend 28 C.F.R. ยง2.13 and 28 C.F.R. ยง2.23 regarding initial hearings being conducted by a panel of two hearing examiners.

agency.textblock: Tom Kowalski, Case Operations, United States Parole Commission, (301) 492-5962.
